content: --हर्षण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} causing thrill or horripilation, thrilling, awe-inspiring; एतानि खलु सर्वभूतरो (लो) महर्षणानि दीर्घारण्यानि <ls>U. 2</ls>; संवादमिममश्रौषमद्भुत रोमहर्षणं <ls>Bg. 18. 74.</ls> (--णः <ab>N.</ab> of Sūta, a pupil of Vyāsa who narrated several Purāṇas to Śaunaka. (--णं erection of hair on the body, thrill.
